entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
